long_desc.thetext:
Latest upstream release: 7.20
Current version in Fedora Rawhide: 7.19
URL: http://drupal.org/project/drupal

Please consult the package updates policy before you issue an update to a stable branch: https://fedoraproject.org/wiki/Updates_Policy

More information about the service that created this bug can be found at:
https://fedoraproject.org/wiki/Upstream_release_monitoring

drupal7-7.20-1.el6 has been submitted as an update for Fedora EPEL 6.
https://admin.fedoraproject.org/updates/drupal7-7.20-1.el6

drupal7-7.20-1.fc17 has been submitted as an update for Fedora 17.
https://admin.fedoraproject.org/updates/drupal7-7.20-1.fc17

drupal7-7.20-1.el5 has been submitted as an update for Fedora EPEL 5.
https://admin.fedoraproject.org/updates/drupal7-7.20-1.el5

drupal7-7.20-1.fc18 has been submitted as an update for Fedora 18.
https://admin.fedoraproject.org/updates/drupal7-7.20-1.fc18
drupal7-7.20-1.fc18 has been pushed to the Fedora 18 stable repository.  If problems still persist, please make note of it in this bug report.
drupal7-7.20-1.fc17 has been pushed to the Fedora 17 stable repository.  If problems still persist, please make note of it in this bug report.

drupal7-7.21-1.el6 has been submitted as an update for Fedora EPEL 6.
https://admin.fedoraproject.org/updates/drupal7-7.21-1.el6

drupal7-7.21-1.el5 has been submitted as an update for Fedora EPEL 5.
https://admin.fedoraproject.org/updates/drupal7-7.21-1.el5

Package drupal7-7.21-1.el6:
* should fix your issue,
* was pushed to the Fedora EPEL 6 testing repository,
* should be available at your local mirror within two days.
Update it with:
# su -c 'yum update --enablerepo=epel-testing drupal7-7.21-1.el6'
as soon as you are able to.
Please go to the following url:
https://admin.fedoraproject.org/updates/FEDORA-EPEL-2013-0528/drupal7-7.21-1.el6
then log in and leave karma (feedback).

drupal7-7.21-2.el6 has been submitted as an update for Fedora EPEL 6.
https://admin.fedoraproject.org/updates/drupal7-7.21-2.el6

drupal7-7.22-1.el6 has been submitted as an update for Fedora EPEL 6.
https://admin.fedoraproject.org/updates/drupal7-7.22-1.el6

drupal7-7.22-1.el5 has been submitted as an update for Fedora EPEL 5.
https://admin.fedoraproject.org/updates/drupal7-7.22-1.el5
drupal7-7.22-1.el5 has been pushed to the Fedora EPEL 5 stable repository.  If problems still persist, please make note of it in this bug report.
drupal7-7.22-1.el6 has been pushed to the Fedora EPEL 6 stable repository.  If problems still persist, please make note of it in this bug report.

comments.text: This update has been submitted for testing by pfrields.
This update is currently being pushed to the Fedora EPEL 5 testing updates repository.
This update has been pushed to testing
This update has been obsoleted by https://admin.fedoraproject.org/updates/drupal7-7.21-1.el5

notes: New upstream 7.20, resolves SA-CORE-2013-002. Release notes upstream: http://drupal.org/drupal-7.20-release-notes
title: drupal7-7.20-1.el5
